class_notes:
All enrollment by permission only and must go through Debbie Allen in the Political Science Department.


This course provides an introduction to large-sample casual inference using standard techniques: regression (parametric and non-parametric), matching, weighting and doubly robust techniques, instrumental variables, fixed effects and difference-in-differences. The course also covers methods of statistical estimation used for these approaches.
course_description: This course provides an introduction to large-sample casual inference using standard techniques: regression (parametric and non-parametric), matching, weighting and doubly robust techniques, instrumental variables, fixed effects and difference-in-differences. The course also covers methods of statistical estimation used for these approaches.
prerequisites: POLS 508 and POLS 509 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
